About Me

I'm a senior engineer on the prediction team at Motional where I work on machine learning models for behavior prediction and planning. I received my PhD in electrical and computer engineering from UC San Diego in 2022, where I was advised by Prof. Mohan Trivedi.

Iâ€™m broadly interested in computer vision and machine learning for autonomous driving. Specifically, my research focuses on behavior prediction models - to predict the intent and trajectories of surrounding vehicles and pedestrians, and to predict driver behavior during control transitions.
